channel.title: CVE Feed for Noah Kagan -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Noah Kagan -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-30548|2024-08-02T01:38:59.990Z -- noah%20kagan -- underconstruction
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Noah Kagan underConstruction allows Stored XSS.This issue affects underConstruction: from n/a through 1.21.

item.title: CVE-2024-24865|2024-02-05T06:08:13.495Z -- noah%20kagan -- scroll%20triggered%20box
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Noah Kagan Scroll Triggered Box allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Scroll Triggered Box: from n/a through 2.3.
